title: Digital scratch card, voucher card to scratch, gift card, scratch card digital download, coupon digital, gift card, gift
description:
Discover the fascinating world of digital scratch cards! Our unique scratch cards are the perfect way to share emotions and celebrate special moments. Whether it's birthdays, weddings or anniversaries - with our digital scratch cards you can give your greetings an innovative and surprising touch.

Easy access:
Buying your digital scratch card is child's play. After purchase, you will receive the link via Etsy message within 24 hours. You can then personalize and download your card and use it on various devices. This will be available to you for 30 days. At the same time, we will personally send you the link to your download.

Versatility:
Our digital scratch cards are suitable for every occasion - be it for private celebrations or business events. Give your congratulations a modern touch and impress friends, family or customers.

Fast shipping:
Forget the wait for physical cards! Our digital scratch vouchers are available immediately and can be downloaded directly after purchase. Save time and impress the recipients immediately.

Customer satisfaction:
Our numerous positive reviews speak for themselves. The high quality of our digital scratch cards and our dedicated customer service stand for the highest level of customer satisfaction.

Discover the world of digital scratch coupons now and give your greetings a touch of innovation and surprise! Treat yourself and your loved ones to a unique experience that will be remembered for a long time.

─────────── PACKAGE CONTENTS ───────────
Digital scratch card


─────────────── WHAT DO I GET? ──────────────
With this offer you will receive an immediately accessible scratch card with a validity of 30 days

✅ Works on mobile devices or PC
✅ Direct editing options 
✅ Flexible and user-friendly 
✅ Also works on mobile devices 
✅ Customizable personalized text
❌ No physical prints included 

──────── HOW IT WORKS ─────────
After confirming payment, you can download your scratch card instructions file directly using your PC or laptop. 

ATTENTION: YOU WILL RECEIVE THE LINK TO THE SCRATCH CARD WITHIN 24 HOURS AFTER PAYMENT HAS BEEN RECEIVED


 ──────── OTHER IMPORTANT NOTES────────
This is a purely digital product. Due to the digital nature of the product, instant download items cannot be returned or exchanged. 
If you have any problems or questions, please do not hesitate to contact us! 

────────── ADDITIONAL PRODUCTS ─────────
Looking for more items? We definitely have what you're looking for! 
Take a look at other items in our shop. You can find personalized children's T-shirts and digital products such as invitations, party invitations or products for WhatsApp.
Go to the shop here: https://www.etsy.com/de/shop/KreativJSDesign

Visit our other shop. There you will find everything about wedding templates.
Go to the shop here: https://www.etsy.com/de/shop/KreativJSDigital

──────── COPYRIGHT NOTICE ─────────
All products, designs and graphics in our shop are protected by copyright by KreativJSDesign. The products may only be used for private use. Any commercial use or modification is not permitted.
The general terms and conditions of KreativJSDesign apply

**IMPORTANT EMAIL WARNING** 
-------------------------- 
**PLEASE LOG IN DIRECTLY WITH ETSY BEFORE PURCHASING** 
When you log in to Etsy using your Apple ID, Etsy will generate a random email address. This will send you the link to your templates via this randomly generated address. If you have logged in with an Apple ID and do not have access to your templates, don't worry! Just contact me and I will send you the link directly via message so that you can access your purchased templates..
